item.description:
RSVP to obtain participation info:http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar

---------------------------------------------------------

Grow Your Real Estate Network
Collaperty makes it easy for you through simple tools to browse real estate opportunities and connect with other investors who share similar real estate interests. Whether you are looking for your next real estate investment or need others to pool your money with, Collaperty is the place – It's real estate collaboration made easy.

www.Collaperty.com

What will be covered at the Webinar:

  • What is Collaperty?
  • Who is it for?
  • How it works.


Collaperty Investors' Benefits:

  • Identify Quality Opportunities
  • Invest in Equity & Find the Right Partner
  • Grow Your Real Estate Network


Collaperty Sponsors' Benefits:

  • Market Yourself and Your Deal
  • Hold an Investment Round
  • Access Accredited Investors & Institutions

---------------------------------------------------------

RSVP to obtain Participation Info: http://simplydoit.net/RSVPtoWebinar
item.name: The First Social Commercial Real Estate Network - COLLAPERTY
